attributes.action: Hold a by-election in Bury South following Christian Wakeford's defection.
attributes.additional_details: Hold a by-election when MPs defect, as they no longer represent the views of the people they were elected to represent.
attributes.background: There should be a by-election held in Bury South following Christian Wakeford's defection from the Conservatives to Labour.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory by-election for MPs who resign from their party or lose the whip: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606743
